biography: Martin, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a wealth of experience to the greens. Representing St. Laurence Golf, Martin is known for his meticulous approach to the game and an uncanny ability to read the course, making him a formidable opponent in any format. Off the course, Martin is rumored to be a keen strategist, often seen analyzing past tournaments and devising new tactics.

With eight past appearances and gearing up for his ninth at Hector Trophée 2025, Martin has shown great commitment to the event. His dedication bore fruit when he and his partner secured victory one year, etching their names into the tournament's history. In addition to his pair title, Martin has also distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player, capturing the coveted Victor Trophy. He is still actively participating in Hector events.

Known for his sportsmanship and competitive spirit, Martin is always a player to watch. Whether he is plotting his next move on the course or sharing a laugh with fellow competitors, Martin embodies the essence of the Hector Trophée.
